title: GF-02 Host Metrics

panels.description: Total CPU cores available on the host.
panels.title: Cores

panels.description: Total physical memory on the host.
panels.title: RAM

panels.description: Total swap space configured on the host.
panels.title: Swap

panels.description: Percentage of filesystem space used (worst mount point).
panels.title: Disk Used %

panels.description: Available filesystem space per mount point.
panels.title: Disk Avail

panels.description: CPU utilization breakdown by type (stacked). Each series is normalized per core.
panels.title: CPU Usage %

panels.description: Normalized system load average (divided by CPU count). Values above 1.0 indicate saturation.
panels.title: System Load

panels.description: Memory breakdown: actual used, total used (includes cache/buffers), and free.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Swap space used versus total swap configured.
panels.title: Swap Usage

panels.description: Filesystem usage percentage per mount point.
panels.title: Disk Usage %

panels.description: Disk read and write throughput (bytes/s) derived from cumulative counters.
panels.title: Disk I/O

panels.description: Network bytes received (RX) and transmitted (TX) per second.
panels.title: Network Traffic

panels.description: Network errors and dropped packets per second (in + out).
panels.title: Network Errors

description: Grafana host system metrics: CPU, memory, disk I/O, and network traffic.
